name: Gravity (itch) (docquantum)
description:
You're on spaceship where gravity is not as it seems

  • WS/Arrow Keys: Move left/right
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • 1: Previous Level
  • 2: Next Level

hint: Jump at a wall
